solution_line_template: James lost {friends_lost} friends, so he has {initial_friends} - {friends_lost} = <<{initial_friends}-{friends_lost}={friends_after_loss}>>{friends_after_loss} friends left.
Then he made {friends_gained} friend, James now has {friends_after_loss} + {friends_gained} = <<{friends_after_loss}+{friends_gained}={final_friends}>>{final_friends} friends.
